item.title: Silence
For the Children of Palestine II
The Moving Finger Writes
item.description: The moving finger writes; and, having writ, Moves on: Nor all your piety nor wit

item.title: Learning solutions of parametric Navier-Stokes with physics-informed neural networks
item.description: A draft of our research on accelerated solution of Navier-Stokes equations is now on arXiv: Learning solutions of parametric Navier-Stokes with physics-informed neural networks

item.title: Machine Learning and differential equations?
item.description: Once in a while I hear the question: “how machine learning can have any connection with differential equations?

item.title: For Children of Palestine
item.description: Human beings are members of a whole, In creation of one essence and soul.

item.title: In search for algorithms that are fast with math!
item.description: Recently, I gave a presentation at AI4b.io symposium on accelerating Computational Fluid Dynamics with Machine Learning.

item.title: Persian New Year
item.description: Happy Nowruz, the starting day of Spring and the Persian new year.

item.title: the death of flames
item.description: Amongst the various kinds of deaths, The most bitter is the death of leaves,

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: I would like to start writing here with a poem by Ferdowsi.
